Contact Void Spectre

Summon Commander:#1562 Void Spectre
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
With this spell an Astral mage can contact a dead Starspawn and call him forth into this world as a Void Spectre. A Void Spectre affects the dreams of entire provinces and can use this to spread insanity in enemy territories.
